title: Coconut Lentil Curry
instructions: Cook lentils until soft, add coconut milk and spices, simmer.

title: Chicken Fried Rice
instructions: Stir fry chicken, add rice, vegetables, soy sauce, and egg.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Stir fry vegetables in oil, add garlic and soy sauce.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook beef with onion and garlic, add tomato sauce, serve with spaghetti.

title: Tomato Soup
instructions: Simmer tomatoes with onion and garlic, blend, and add cream.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread slices, add cheese, grill until golden.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix ingredients, pour batter on pan, flip when bubbles form.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef, fill tortillas with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

title: Caesar Salad
instructions: Mix lettuce, croutons, parmesan, chicken, and dressing.

title: Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs with milk, cook in pan, add onion, cheese, and pepper.

title: Mashed Potatoes
instructions: Boil potatoes, mash with butter, milk, salt, and pepper.

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Cook chicken with onion, garlic, and ginger, add curry powder and simmer.

title: Fish Tacos
instructions: Cook fish, serve in tortilla with cabbage, lime, and salsa.

title: Margarita Pizza
instructions: Spread tomato sauce on dough, top with mozzarella and basil, bake.

title: French Toast
instructions: Dip bread in egg mixture, cook on pan until golden.

title: Fried Noodles
instructions: Stir fry noodles with vegetables, chicken, soy sauce, and egg.

title: Chili Con Carne
instructions: Cook beef and onion, add beans, tomatoes, and chili powder, simmer.

title: Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend banana with milk, honey, and yogurt until smooth.

title: Egg Fried Rice
instructions: Stir fry rice with egg, onion, peas, and soy sauce.

title: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Cook rice slowly with broth, add mushrooms, onion, and parmesan.
